name: War-Ships
description:
Description

War-Ships is a short naval combat game.

  • There are two cannons, one on either side of the ship.
  • Each cannon takes time to reload. Plan your shots.
  • Maneuver your ship to avoid enemy cannons.
  • You can also ram into the enemy ship to cause damage.
  • Play a short campaign of 10 levels.
  • Each level has a randomized enemy.
  • Choose an upgrade at the end of each level.
  • There are 10 stats for the ship, but you can upgrade only 5 of them over the course of the campaign.
  • Have fun!

Controls

  • Click on a location to move the ship there.
  • Use the on-screen buttons or keyboard shortcuts to fire the Left (Key A) or Right (Key D) cannons.
  • Press 'Esc' to pause the game.

Credits

Design and Development: Raghunandan M. A.

  • Action Synth+Harp Track, PetterTheSturgeon, link
  • Battle Music, Alexandr Zhelanov, link
  • UI sound effects, Kenney.nl, link
  • Platformer Sounds, yd, link
  • 2 High Quality Explosions, Michel Baradari, link
  • Water splashes, Michel Baradari, link
  • Single and Multi Explosion, Marcelo Fernandez, link
  • Level finish fanfares, Johan Brodd 2014, link
  • Victory Fanfare Short, cynicmusic, link (cynicmusic, pixelsphere)
